column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I went back on the keto diet and wanted to try the crustless pizza. I thought it was really good! My friend didn't care for the grayish color of the sausage
column2: even though I told him it can happen when cooking sausage. Sometimes
column3: biting into it could get frustrating because the cheese wants to come all the way off
column4: but the taste was just like a pizza and I would definitely order it again. It's nice to have another ketogenic option and not have to cook.
